name: The Amino Acid Journey
description:
The Amino Acid Journey visual novel is a game created for the LCHM1371b course of the UCLouvain.

Created by Elfie Gashi Vandenhove, Léopold Guyot, Paulin Fournaux, Stéphane Hiernaux and Alizée Harte.

Music by SergeQuadrado from Pixabay.

All illustrations are made by us.

And thanks to My Kim Tran and Kiarash Najib for the drawings of Asparagine, Sérine and Phosphosérine transférase !
